name: PCC
task: Think about yourself, given what you remember.

connections.amPFC: Integrate what you know about yourself with your personal goals.
connections.vmPFC: Retrieve autobiographical memories or imagine future scenarios.
connections.RSC: Clarify the spatial and contextual aspects of a memory.
connections.dmPFC: Infer the beliefs, intentions and perspectives of others. Judge the morality of a situation or belief system.
